Reference

All functions

backprojectFCnet()

Back-projection of regression coefficients onto the original space

cv_FCnet()

CrossValidate FCnet model

evalFCnet()

Evaluate model's prediction against the observed true values

FCnetLOO()

Leave-One-Out fit of elastic nets for Functional Connectivity data with nested crossvalidation

get_CVparsFCnet()

Internal function for retrieving crossvalidated parameters of cv_FCnet

loadFC()

Read and load Functional Connectivity matrices or volumes

optionsFCnet()

Set or get options for FCnet

permutateLOO()

Permutation test for FCnetLOO

plotFC()

plot a Functional Connectivity matrix

plotFCnet()

plot a FCnet model

plot_volume()

plot a brain Volume

reduce_featuresFC()

Reduce the dimensionality of Functional Connectivity matrices or volumes

run_FCnet()

FCnet (experimental) shiny Graphic User Interface

select_coefficients()

Selection of coefficients based on the outcome of permutateLOO

polishMat() simulateMat() biasMat() noiseMat()

A set of functions for the simulation of Functional Connectivity matrices
